---
title: "Getting started"
description: |
  How to use the `edibble` system to construct a design of an experiment.
date: "4/9/2022"
---

The `edibble` system is an R-package to build a design of an experiment. To use
the system, you will need to install the free, open-source programming language [R](https://www.r-project.org/)
and install the package:

```r
install.packages("edibble")
```

```r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("emitanaka/edibble")
```
